title: FSM Android Wear Watch Face
summary: Flying Spaghetti Monster watch face for Android Wear 5 and greater
developerAddress:
49 St Aubins Court
Balmes Road
London
N1 5TN
description: Now you can tell the time with his noodly appendages!The Flying Spaghetti Monster watch face is designed for all pastafarians (and any one else in fact) who want a stylish way to tell them time and remind themselves of his pastaness.The watch feature a completely unique meatball mechanism for propelling us through time.The watch battery level is shown by the amount of tomato sauce on his noodliness' beating heart.This is an Android Wear Watch Face for android wear>5. This face supports all known round and square watches and has an anti-burn-in screen friendly ambient mode.
descriptionHTML:
Now you can tell the time with his noodly appendages!

The Flying Spaghetti Monster watch face is designed for all pastafarians (and any one else in fact) who want a stylish way to tell them time and remind themselves of his pastaness.

The watch feature a completely unique meatball mechanism for propelling us through time.

The watch battery level is shown by the amount of tomato sauce on his noodliness' beating heart.

This is an Android Wear Watch Face for android wear>5. This face supports all known round and square watches and has an anti-burn-in screen friendly ambient mode.
comments: Arrrargh! FSM the one true and statistically valid belief!  We have charts!  R'amen!
Great watchface but has been pirated
May your day be noodly and filled with many great sauce

All praise his noodlyness This watch face is the perfect way to show others that you are a true believer. It is oft rumoured that pirates, the original pastafarians, had very similar time pieces that they used to navigate the vast oceans. Make sure you don't get lost in today's spaghetti-monster-less world by wearing this watch face with pride!
So cool!! Long live his noodliness!
Spaghetti Looks good on the Moto 360
recentChanges: The watch battery level is now shown by the amount of tomato sauce on his noodliness' beating heart.
